scripts.clear: cd client; rm -rf build; rm -rf cache
scripts.build:backend: cd api; npm run build; npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd client; npm run build; npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run clear; npm run build:backend; npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install; cd api; npm install; cd ../client; npm install
scripts.build: npm run clear; npm run build:backend; npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm install pm2; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
